items.content_html: ModularORM is a lightweight and flexible TypeScript ORM library that enables seamless interaction with databases using predefined classes and interfaces. It simplifies development while maintaining flexibility and control over your project.

items.content_html: A lightweight JavaScript countdown library with zero dependencies. Create customizable countdown timers with multiple themes, TypeScript support, and a countdown control API for websites and web applications.
items.title: VincentLoy/simplyCountdown.js: A lightweight JavaScript countdown library with zero dependencies. Create customizable countdown timers with multiple themes, TypeScript support, and a countdown control API for websites and web applications.

items.content_html: A lightweight Database GUI in your browser. It supports connecting to Postgres, MySQL, and SQLite.
items.title: outerbase/studio: A lightweight Database GUI in your browser. It supports connecting to Postgres, MySQL, and SQLite.
